column1: This test is done in a hospital or clinic and only takes a few minutes.
Experts do not agree about when women should have mammograms.
This is an exam to feel the breasts and underarms for lumps or unusual changes.
For this reason, you should not rely only on breast exams to screen for cancer.
This screening is done only in women who have a high risk for breast cancer.
For women who have had cancer in one breast, MRIs can be very helpful for finding hidden tumors in the other breast.
Women who have false-negative results do not know they have breast cancer and delay treatment.
